id: indicates the amount of the dealt currency which would be exchanged in a trade for which the stated spot rate applies
name: indicates the amount of the dealt currency which would be exchanged in a trade for which the stated spot rate applies

id: structured collection of quoted or projected exchange rates, such that volatility may be constructed for the structure
name: structured collection of quoted or projected exchange rates, such that volatility may be constructed for the structure

id: indicates the settlement period for a trade for which the stated spot rate applies
name: indicates the settlement period for a trade for which the stated spot rate applies

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO IND 1.0 FTF 2 report, namely, to take advantage of content added via the FIBO FND 1.1 with respect to higher-level concepts of Rate, ExchangeRate, and InterestRate.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO IND 1.0 FTF 2 report, namely, to take advantage of content added via the FIBO FND 1.1 with respect to higher-level concepts of Rate, ExchangeRate, and InterestRate.

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate unnecessary references, some of which had incorrect datatypes, rename FxSpotVolatility to CurrencySpotVolatility and improve its definition and related volatility definitions more generally.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate unnecessary references, some of which had incorrect datatypes, rename FxSpotVolatility to CurrencySpotVolatility and improve its definition and related volatility definitions more generally.

id: indicative spot buying market rate as observed by the reporting source
name: indicative spot buying market rate as observed by the reporting source

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the FIBO 2.0 RFC.

id: electronic funds transfer (EFT) service involving the transfer of funds across national borders, that may also involve currency conversion
name: electronic funds transfer (EFT) service involving the transfer of funds across national borders, that may also involve currency conversion

id: indicates the quote currency in an exchange rate; R units of this currency represent one unit of the base currency
name: indicates the quote currency in an exchange rate; R units of this currency represent one unit of the base currency

id: indicative spot selling market rate as observed by the reporting source
name: indicative spot selling market rate as observed by the reporting source

id: foreign exchange service involving the conversion of currency of one country or group of countries for another, typically, but not always, as a counter transaction
name: foreign exchange service involving the conversion of currency of one country or group of countries for another, typically, but not always, as a counter transaction

id: rate of exchange between two currencies as specified as of some date and time as quoted by a specific source
name: rate of exchange between two currencies as specified as of some date and time as quoted by a specific source

id: statistical measure of the rate of change in the rate at which one currency can be exchanged for another
name: statistical measure of the rate of change in the rate at which one currency can be exchanged for another

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).

id: Volatility is modeled here using a structured collection, comprised of a series of individual exchange rates (either projected or prior quoted rates), dates, and the source for those rates for some overall period of time
name: Volatility is modeled here using a structured collection, comprised of a series of individual exchange rates (either projected or prior quoted rates), dates, and the source for those rates for some overall period of time

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.

id: This ontology provides the parameters for foreign exchange rates, covering spot and forward rates, as well as foreign exchange spot rate volatilities.
name: This ontology provides the parameters for foreign exchange rates, covering spot and forward rates, as well as foreign exchange spot rate volatilities.

id: an exchange rate expressed as a premium on the spot rate for the currency pair
name: an exchange rate expressed as a premium on the spot rate for the currency pair

id: Spot rates represent the prices buyers pay in one currency to purchase a second currency. Although the spot exchange rate is for delivery on the earliest value date, the standard settlement date for most spot transactions is two business days after the transaction date.
name: Spot rates represent the prices buyers pay in one currency to purchase a second currency. Although the spot exchange rate is for delivery on the earliest value date, the standard settlement date for most spot transactions is two business days after the transaction date.

id: A currency exchange service may be provided by a stand-alone business or may be part of the services offered by a bank or other financial institution. The currency exchange profits from its services either through adjusting the exchange rate or taking a commission.
name: A currency exchange service may be provided by a stand-alone business or may be part of the services offered by a bank or other financial institution. The currency exchange profits from its services either through adjusting the exchange rate or taking a commission.

id: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of past actual values for exchange rates
name: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of past actual values for exchange rates

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to add the source for a quoted exchange rate (DER-143).
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to add the source for a quoted exchange rate (DER-143).

id: rate of exchange between two currencies for settlement at some future point in time, expressed as a premium on the spot rate
name: rate of exchange between two currencies for settlement at some future point in time, expressed as a premium on the spot rate

id: financial service involving the exchange of one currency for another, conversion of one currency for another, and transfer of money from one country to another whereby currency conversion is required
name: financial service involving the exchange of one currency for another, conversion of one currency for another, and transfer of money from one country to another whereby currency conversion is required

id: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of projected values for exchange rates
name: measure of exchange rate fluctuation based on a range of projected values for exchange rates

id: An exchange rate of R represents a rate of R units of the quoted currency to 1 unit of the base currency.
name: An exchange rate of R represents a rate of R units of the quoted currency to 1 unit of the base currency.

id: indicates the origin of a quoted exchange rate
name: indicates the origin of a quoted exchange rate

id: rate at which one currency may be exchanged for another for immediate delivery
name: rate at which one currency may be exchanged for another for immediate delivery

id: exchange rate quoted at a specific point in time, for a given block amount of currency as quoted against another (base) currency
name: exchange rate quoted at a specific point in time, for a given block amount of currency as quoted against another (base) currency

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO IND 1.0 FTF 1 report.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified per the issue resolutions identified in the FIBO IND 1.0 FTF 1 report.

id: indicative middle market (mean of spot buying and selling) rate as observed by the reporting source
name: indicative middle market (mean of spot buying and selling) rate as observed by the reporting source

id: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate deprecated elements.
name: ForeignExchange.rdf version of this ontology was modified to eliminate deprecated elements.
